paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted variants in the TTR gene, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.phenotype_details: symptomatic with NYHA functional class II or higher
individual_records.evidence_sentence: All patients (n = 20) declared African ancestries and had transthyretin gene sequencing displaying either ATTR Val122Ile (p.Val142Ile) or Ile107Val (p.Ile127Val) mutations.

functional_data.summary: The study suggests that increased lung retention of 99mTc-HMDP is associated with impaired pulmonary function.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in families as all patients are symptomatic.
variants.additional_notes: All patients were symptomatic with NYHA functional class II or higher.
